resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105079</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105079</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic Field Activities for the High School Classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch Fangen Sie Aktivitäten für 
das High School Klassenzimmer auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités de champ magnétique pour la salle de 
classe de lycée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades do campo magnético para a sala de aula
da High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività del campo magnetico per l'aula della 
High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητες μαγνητικών πεδίων για την τάξη 
γυμνασίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividades del campo magnético para la sala de 
clase de la High School secundaria</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students understand the vector nature of fields, the ubiquity of fields in the environment, and the 3-dimensionality of fields. Activities include mapping the magnetic field of a room, making a magnetometer, and studying plasma.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Kursteilnehmer verstehen, daß die 
vektornatur von auffängt, fängt die Allgegenwart 
von in der Umgebung auf, und das 3-dimensionality von fängt 
auf. Aktivitäten schließen das Diagramm das magnetische 
auffangen von einem Raum ein, bilden ein Magnetometer, und 
studieren Plasma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'aides comprennent la nature de 
vecteur des zones, l'ubiquité des zones dans l'environnement, et le 
3-dimensionality des zones. Les activités incluent tracer le 
champ magnétique d'une salle, faire un magnétocompteur, et étudier 
le plasma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ajudas compreendem a natureza do
vetor dos campos, o ubiquity dos campos no ambiente, e o 
3-dimensionality dos campos. As atividades incluem traçar o 
campo magnético de um quarto, fazer um magnetômetro, e estudar o 
plasma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di aiuti capiscono la natura di 
vettore dei campi, l'ubiquità dei campi nell'ambiente ed il 
3-dimensionality dei campi. Le attività includono il tracciato 
del campo magnetico di una stanza, fare un magnetometro e studiare il 
plasma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βοηθά τους σπουδαστές να καταλάβουν τη διανυσματική 
φύση των πεδίων, την πανταχού παρουσία των πεδίων στο 
περιβάλλον, και την 3-διαστατικότητα των πεδίων. Οι 
δραστηριότητες περιλαμβάνουν τη χαρτογράφηση του μαγνητικού 
πεδίου ενός δωματίου, την κατασκευή ενός μαγνητομέτρου, και τη 
μελέτη του πλάσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ayudas entienden la 
naturaleza del vector de campos, la ubicuidad de campos en el 
ambiente, y el 3-dimensionality de campos. Las actividades 
incluyen asociar el campo magnético de un cuarto, la fabricación de 
un magnetómetro, y estudiar plasma.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105079</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/magnetic-field-activities-for-the-high-school-classroom</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
